title: Add Sunglasses To Photo
playgroundDescription: AI Glasses Filter automatically adds stylish sunglasses to your photos, giving your pictures a cool, trendy, and modern look.

metadata.title: Add Sunglasses To Your Photos - Free AI Glasses Filter
metadata.description: Add Sunglasses to your photos for free with the AI Glasses Filter. The AI automatically adds stylish shades to your face to make a cool look.

faqs.heading: Frequently Asked Questions about AI Age Filter

questions.question: What is the 'Add Sunglasses To Photo' filter?
questions.answer: This filter uses AI to detect faces in your photo and add sunglasses automatically, giving your picture a cool, stylish look in seconds.

questions.question: How long does it take to add sunglasses to my photo?
questions.answer: It usually takes just a few seconds. The time may vary depending on your photo, but our AI is very fast and works quicker than most other tools.

questions.question: Is it free to use this filter?
questions.answer: Yes! Just sign up for a free account on our website, and you will get free credits to try the 'Add Sunglasses To Photo' filter and other effects.

questions.question: Are my uploaded photos safe and private?
questions.answer: Yes. We take your privacy seriously. Your images are uploaded securely, only used to apply the effect, and deleted from our servers after a short time.

questions.question: Can I choose the style of the sunglasses?
questions.answer: Right now, the AI automatically picks a stylish pair that fits your face. We are working on adding more options for customization in the future.

questions.question: What file formats do you support?
questions.answer: We support JPEG, PNG, and WEBP. You can upload images from your computer or mobile device without converting them.

reviews.review: This is my go-to for quickly adding sunglasses to my photos. Dreamshot makes it super easy and the results look surprisingly real!
reviews.name: William

reviews.review: Works like a charm! I tried it for a profile picture and loved how it turned out. So simple to use.
reviews.name: Theodore

reviews.review: I was impressed with the variety of sunglasses available. It's a fun and effective tool for adding a bit of style to any picture.
reviews.name: Mateo

howItWorks.heading: How to Add Sunglasses to Your Photo

steps.title: Choose Your Photo
bulletPoints: Select a high-quality photo from your device with good lighting to get the best results.

steps.title: Apply Sunglasses Effect
bulletPoints: Click the “Generate Now” button to add stylish sunglasses to your photo.

steps.title: Save & Share
bulletPoints: Download your edited photo and share it with friends, family, or on social media.
